QuestData.Title: Spread the Word
QuestData.Description: For rendering me faithful service, I grant you your life. Take it and be gone from my sight. Let your people know of all that has transpired.$B$BAnd $n, if we ever cross paths again, you will die.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Fizzle Brassbolts on Fizzle & Pozzik's Speedbarge in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: Wow, she's evil! But, what does it mean, $n? Is Magatha going to destroy us? Is she in charge of the Twilight's Hammer now?$B$BWhatever happens, you've delivered us from our enemies. Please allow me to show you our gratitude.
